pages.text: $(li)The Lock Block can be bound with a $(l:patchouli:tools/supplementaries/key)Key$(/l).
$(li)To bind it, just right click a Lock Block while you are holding the Key in your hand.
$(li)Then right click on the Lock Block while you have the Key in your inventory, this one will emit a Redstone Pulse of nearby blocks.
$(li)You can save the Key in your Bubbles inventory too, eliminating the need to keep the Key in your main inventory.
